testcase.name: Add a new customer
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User can view the Dashboard............................................passed When User click on customer menu............................................passed And User click on Customer Menu item........................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then user can view Add new customer page....................................passed When user enter customer info...............................................passed And click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view conformation message "Customers / nopCommerce administration".passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Search the user by username
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User can view the Dashboard............................................passed When User click on customer menu............................................passed And User click on Customer Menu item........................................passed When User type first name...................................................passed And User type last name.....................................................passed When click on search button.................................................passed Then User should be able to find customer by name...........................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then Page title should be "Dashboard/ nopCommerce administraiton"...........passed When User click on the logout link..........................................passed Then Page title should be "Your store.Login"................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
